研究由意大利佛羅倫斯大學團隊負責，分析443名曾染新冠肺炎的男性，年齡介乎30至65歲，研究團隊在病者康復一個月後，收集其精液樣本。



https://olhardigital.com.br/en/2021/02/09/news/covid-19-may-affect-sperm-production/
Samples from 43 individuals aged between 30 and 65 years were analyzed in the survey


https://www.livescience.com/covid-19-may-lower-sperm-counts.html
The study researchers, from the University of Florence in Italy, analyzed semen samples from 43 men ages 30 to 65 about one month after they had recovered from COVID-19.
